Key Match Events: Andy Ibáñez hit a tiebreaking three-run double in Detroit’s four-run eighth inning
Parker Meadows homered as Detroit ended Houston’s run of seven consecutive appearances in the AL Championship Series
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was the first playoff series win for the Detroit Tigers since the 2013 ALDS
Others: Detroit used seven different pitchers a day after pitching Triple Crown winner Tarik Skubal got the win in the series opener
Houston starter Hunter Brown had allowed just one hit on a double in the second when Meadows smacked his home run off the foul pole in right field to start the sixth
